info.description: INSIST adalah sistem manajemen manufaktur milik PT. Indoseiki Metalutama. REST API Documentation untuk INSIST menjelaskan bagaimana pengembang dapat menggunakan API ini untuk mengelola dan mengakses data manufaktur perusahaan dengan aman dan efisien, menggunakan protokol HTTP dan metode REST seperti GET, POST, PUT, & DELETE.
info.title: INSIST REST API Documentation

get.description: Retrieves banks with pagination and optional search

post.description: Create a new bank with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve a specific bank by its ID

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users based on search criteria

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided details

get.description: Retrieves user details based on the provided user ID

put.description: Updates user details based on the provided user ID and new data

delete.description: Deletes an existing user based on the provided user ID

put.description: Changes the password for user

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid input or Confirm password does not match

post.description: Create a new role permission or update an existing one if it already exists
post.summary: Create or update a role permission

201.description: Role permission created or updated successfully

get.description: Retrieve the menu tree associated with a specific role by role ID

200.description: Menu tree role permission retrieved successfully

put.description: Change the password for the authenticated user

post.description: Login with username and password, returns access token

delete.description: Log out the user by invalidating the refresh token

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing refresh token

post.description: Resets the user's password using a valid, unused, and non-expired token

400.description: Bad Request: Passwords do not match or input is invalid

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the specified user after generating a reset token
post.summary: Send a password reset link to the user's email

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to send email

get.description: Renew the access token using a valid refresh token from cookies

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing refresh token

post.description: Validate the user's two-factor authentication using an OTP key

get.description: Retrieve the information of the currently logged-in user

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing access token

put.description: Configures two-factor authentication and generates an OTP key for the specified user
put.summary: Set up two-factor authentication for a user

get.description: Fetches a list of machine details with optional sorting, and pagination.
get.summary: Retrieve machine details with pagination, sorting, and filtering

parameters.description: Sorting direction: true for ascending, false for descending
parameters.name: sortDirection

404.description: Not Found: No machine details found

put.description: This endpoint creates a new revision of an existing machine by copying its details and updating the revision number.
put.summary: Create a new revision of an existing machine

get.description: Fetches a list of machine status details for a specific machine ID with optional sorting and pagination.
get.summary: Retrieve machine status details with pagination, sorting, and filtering

parameters.description: Column name to sort by (default: detail_updated_at)
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: Sorting direction: false for ascending, true for descending (default: false)
parameters.name: sortDirection

404.description: Not Found: No machine status details found

put.description: Adds a new status entry for a specific machine ID.
